page.title: 17Local shops
page.content: The most important road at Brownhill is Whalley New Road. A traffic count showed ninety-one cars, three vans, seven motorbikes one lorry and two buses in five minutes. The shops are always full of people. The grocer's, co-op and paper-shop are the busiest. The co-op is a big store that sells and hires out videos, video tapes and televisions. It also sells packed meats, frozen food, canned food, vegetables, household products and fruit. It is like a supermarket. Another busy shop is the fish and chip shop. Open five days a week it is an excellent quick food shop. It sells pies, puddings, peas, as well as fish and chips, of course. It also sells 'pop' (carbonated water) but the Newsagent does best with that.
